mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select class_no as classNo, member_no as memberNo, class_title as classTitle, class_price as classPrice from cooking_class order by class_no asc) c) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select class_no as classNo, class_title as classTitle, member_no as memberNo, class_content as ClassContent, class_start as classStart, class_end as classEnd, class_price as classPrice, class_rate as classRate, class_nop as classNop, class_curr_nop as classCurNop, class_status as classStatus, class_reg_date as classRegDate, class_time as classTime, class_location as classLocation from cooking_class where class_no=#{classNo}
